short_description: 【Advanced PVC Material Projection Screen】Built with professional-grade PVC curtain material and a cinema-grade multi-layer structure,our projection screen is designed to deliver brighter, more accurate images than standard fabric screens. The five-layer polymer construction creates a true 1.5 gain reflective surface, enhancing brightness without color distortion. 【Height-Adjustable X-Shaped Tripod Stand】Designed with durable iron construction, this X-shaped tripod delivers superior structural stability. The height is fully adjustable from 52 to 84.5 inches, making it ideal for multi-person viewing setups. Lightweight yet sturdy, it provides reliable support for both indoor and outdoor movie nights—without relying on excessive weight

【EASY TO CARRY, MULTI-SCENE USE】Professional-grade PVC screens are typically thick and non-foldable, making them difficult to transport. Our design solves this by combining a detachable, foldable tripod structure with a professional PVC screen—preserving image quality while achieving true portability. Installation takes just 3 steps and can be completed by one person in about 2 minutes. The screen disassembles easily, stores compactly, and includes a carrying case for convenient transport.

【2-MINUTES EASY SETUP】Only four steps to complete the installation, (1) Open the folded projection screen tripod and fix the bottom (2) Insert four bracket arms (3) Tighten bracket arms (4) Hang projection screen on hook

【MULTIPLE APPLICATIONS】 Move it effortlessly from room to room: follow a recipe in the kitchen, practice yoga in the living room, enjoy a movie in the bedroom, or take it outdoors for a party with friends. Designed for easy one-person disassembly, carrying, and setup, it adapts seamlessly to your daily routine.
